raw: shall reimburse che same my appreciation and gratitude on les rel mail fer ne nour assure help and quedance yon that dhe week ago under your root can never be fergolles and ste same be remembered witte peness and sweet very my will all 0 to China memones. My work at Haward began Tits second terem last Saturday and I expect to be very bury now ary pan until Juhe. Many of friends are rewning this sem I les semmer and U can not help feeling racher home-se ame sech and que mpees. From the present laication de will not be able to go home entel late this r. I do hope your für Plough again soon and let er Enclosed I am sending à checks $30. to di part of the expenses you had to mear to in our mi connection witte den part hope you will pla let me know how much more I owe you and 9 wree ave son

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter thanking Stearns for his kindness and the party in honor of Kwan and Miss Lee, enclosing a check of $30 for party expenses. Expresses hope that Stearns will visit China later in the year (Pages 1 and 4)
metadata.note_acquisition: Phillips Academy Archives and Special Collections received the letters and materials of Sung Sing Kwan from Alfred E. Stearns in ____(date)
metadata.note_preferred-citation: From The Trustees of Phillips Academy.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
